mapper.select: select * from user where id=#{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name},password=#{password},gender=#{gender},birthday=#{birthday},phone=#{phone}, address=#{address},identity =#{identity } where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, password, gender, birthday, phone, address, identity) values(#{name},#{password},#{gender},#{birthday},#{phone},#{address},#{identity})
